author: Stereogum
title: Watch Rihanna Accept Harvard’s Humanitarian Of The Year Award
text: Last week, Rihanna was named humanitarian of the year by the Harvard Foundation. Today, she accepted the Peter J. Gomes Humanitarian Award at a ceremony that took place at the Sanders Theatre on the university's campus. RiRi was recognized for, among other accomplishments, launching the Believe Foundation at the age of 18, the nonprofit Clara … More »
